column5: Here is a short video I got messing around with underwater gopro footage.
That is great!!  Where did you mount it? I have seen it mounted on the net but you must have it on the boat or canonball?
I have a clamp and pole setup that goes on the side of the boat.
I have a clamp and pole setup that goes on the side of the boat.  Thanks Mike P! I just might have to try it.
nice Vid thanks for posting.   Art
Right on Mike.  Now quit messing around and get back to your lure building. They wont get made by themselves you know! hahaha
Nice!  I bought a Gopro with the sole goal of recording a LSC giant chasing on a figure 8. With baby number 3 due any day it will have to wait till fall to zing some bling!
Thanks guys and yes Ron I'm back at it trying to get caught up again.  Dang number 3 you sure will have to wait to get our.
